title: Number Systems
description: Discover how binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal number systems are used in digital electronics. Learn to convert between bases and apply these skills in real-world logic and computing.
learning_objectives: Learn the structure and purpose of different number systems
Convert numbers between binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal
Understand how these systems apply to digital circuits and computing

subtopics.title: Binary Numbers
subtopics.description: Learn how binary numbers work and their role in computing.

subtopics.title: Octal Numbers
subtopics.description: Understand how octal simplifies binary grouping in digital electronics.

subtopics.title: Hexadecimal Numbers
subtopics.description: Understand base-16 number systems and conversions.

subtopics.title: Binary Coded Decimal (BCD)
subtopics.description: Explore how decimal numbers are represented in digital circuits.

subtopics.title: Gray Code
subtopics.description: Learn about Gray Code and its applications in encoders.
